title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, sauté guanciale in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated cheeses and black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water before draining spaghetti.
Add hot spaghetti to the pan with guanciale, remove from heat.
Quickly mix in egg and cheese mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 1 tbsp tikka masala paste for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pan and cook chicken until browned. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onions until golden, add garlic and ginger.
Add remaining tikka paste and canned tomatoes, simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend sauce until smooth, return to pan.
Add cooked chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy vegetable stir fry with amazing flavors and colorful veggies.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add harder vegetables first (carrots, broccoli), cook for 2 minutes.
Add remaining vegetables, stir fry for 3-4 minutes.
Mix soy sauce, honey, and sesame oil, pour over vegetables.
Toss to coat, garnish with sesame seeds and serve immediately.
